mapper.select: SELECT UNQ_ID as unqId, TO_CHAR(POST_DATE, 'YYYY-mm-dd') as postDate, CONTENT, TO_CHAR(WRITE_DATE, 'YYYY-mm-dd') as writeDate FROM cells

SELECT cells.UNQ_ID as unqId, TO_CHAR(cells.POST_DATE, 'YYYY-mm-dd') as postDate, cells.CONTENT, TO_CHAR(cells.WRITE_DATE, 'YYYY-mm-dd') as writeDate, categorys.NAME as categoryName FROM cells JOIN category_cells ON cells.UNQ_ID = category_cells.CELL_ID JOIN categorys ON category_cells.CATEGORY_ID = categorys.UNQ_ID WHERE cells.UNQ_ID = #{cellId}
